content: MQZ-TW Trapeze Wheel Ultimate galvanized adjustable channel plate for trapeze applications ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Single-piece part combining nut and washer Faster and less error-prone installation compared to traditional alternatives Shaped for optimal handling Easier fine-tune adjustments for leveling Applications Fastening installation channels to threaded rods Connecting threaded rod to strut channels ### TECHNICAL DATA: Wrench size: 1/2 in Material composition: DD11 MOD - HN 547, DC04 - DIN EN 10130 Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Technical Data | Wrench size | 1/2 in | Material composition | DD11 MOD - HN 547, DC04 - DIN EN 10130 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Material thickness | 1/8 in | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2293068 - Channel washer Trapeze Wheel MQZ-TW-3/8 - Package Size 50 pc
